participant_1.background:
I sometimes get so caught up in my own world that I forget to pay attention to the people around me.
i can also squat 400 pounds.
I spent my birthday alone, relaxing at home.
i make 30k a year.
i skydive frequently.

participant_2.background:
I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life.
sometimes i volunteer at an urban farm.
i prefer the night instead of the day.
kpop is my favorite music.
i live on a pig farm.

content.text: Heyy, how are you doing?
Hey! I'm doing well, how about you?
I'm doing alright. What do you do for fun?
I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life.
Oh wow, that's really cool! I'm not very artistic, but I enjoy taking pictures too.
That's great! I love capturing moments and telling stories through my photos.
What's your favorite thing to photograph?
I love taking photos of nature and animals. I live on a pig farm, so I have plenty of subjects to choose from!
Oh wow! That's so cool. I've never been on a pig farm before.
You should come visit sometime! We have a lot of fun here.
I might just do that!
Great! We'd love to have you.
So what kind of pottery do you make?
I make a variety of things, but I specialize in functional pottery. I love creating things that people can use in their everyday lives.
That's really cool! I've always been impressed by people who can make pottery.
Thanks! It's a lot of fun, and it's very rewarding to see your work come to life.
I can imagine. I love seeing all the different colors and textures that you can use in pottery.
Me too! It's a great way to express creativity.
I think it's really cool that you're able to make a living doing something you love.
Thanks! I feel very lucky. I love my job, and I'm grateful that I can share my work with others.
I'm sure your work is very appreciated.
I hope so!
I'm sure it is.
Thanks
